text: Allaha tyo nai ho jasale akasaharula'i bina khamba thadya'idi'eko cha, jasala'i timi dekhiraheka chau, pheri u arsa (sinhasana) mathi ucca bhayo. Usaile surya ra candrala'i aphno adhinama rakhi rakheko cha. Hareka niscita prakriyama gatisila chan, usaile sabai karyako upaya garcha.
